concept.title: Cluck 'n' Dash
concept.description: A simple yet chaotic top-down 2D game where players must guide a brave chicken across a procedurally generated road filled with unpredictable traffic and helpful, or not-so-helpful, farm animals. It's all about timing, reflexes, and embracing the absurdity of poultry road-crossing.
concept.objective: Successfully guide the chicken across the road to reach the safety of the farm on the other side, one road at a time.
mechanics: Tap/Click to move the chicken in the desired direction (up, down, left, right).
Momentum-based movement: Chicken continues in its chosen direction for a short burst, requiring predictive input.
Lane-based navigation: Players must strategically choose lanes to avoid oncoming vehicles.
player_abilities: Dash (limited use): A quick burst of speed to evade immediate danger.
Peck (passive): A very small chance to briefly stun a slow-moving vehicle (rarely useful, mostly for comedic effect).
Cluck (sound cue): Emits a distinct cluck that briefly draws the attention of nearby animals (can be used to lure or distract).

enemies.name: Standard Car
enemies.behavior: Moves at a consistent speed in one lane, cycles through lanes randomly.

enemies.name: Speedy Sedan
enemies.behavior: Moves faster than Standard Cars, less predictable lane changes.

enemies.name: Slow-moving Tractor
enemies.behavior: Moves very slowly but occupies a lane for an extended period, creating a persistent obstacle.

enemies.name: Rogue Pig
enemies.behavior: Wanders erratically across lanes, sometimes blocking paths.

powerups.name: Feather Boost
powerups.effect: Temporarily increases the chicken's movement speed and dash duration.

powerups.name: Worm Treat
powerups.effect: Restores one use of the Dash ability.

powerups.name: Lucky Clover
powerups.effect: Makes the chicken momentarily invincible, passing through any vehicle or animal without harm.

concept.level_progression: Levels increase in difficulty by introducing more vehicles, faster traffic, more complex lane patterns, and new enemy types. Each 'level' is essentially crossing a new segment of the road, with a 'goal' area representing successful passage to the next segment.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for each successful crossing of a road segment. Bonus points are given for collecting powerups, using the dash ability effectively to avoid collisions, and for performing 'cluck' distractions that lead to near-misses. A multiplier increases for consecutive successful crossings without a 'splat'.
concept.visual_style: Bright, cartoony, and slightly exaggerated. Think flat design with bold outlines and vibrant colors. The chicken should be a clear, easily identifiable sprite. Vehicles are simple, recognizable shapes with distinct color palettes. Backgrounds are cheerful and reminiscent of a rural farm setting.
concept.sound_theme: Uplifting and quirky. A catchy, looping bluegrass or country-inspired soundtrack. Sound effects are punchy and comical: 'clucks', 'squawks', distinct vehicle horns and engine sounds, comical 'splat' noises (muted and not overly graphic), and satisfying 'ding' sounds for powerups and successful crossings.

level_design.name: The First Crossing
level_design.description: A gentle introduction to the chaos of Cluck 'n' Dash. Navigate a few cautious vehicles and learn the ropes of lane-switching. Collect some shiny coins and maybe learn to outmaneuver a simple drone.

assets.player: A bright yellow, round chicken with stubby black legs, a small red comb, and beady black eyes. Bold black outline.

enemies.basic: A grumpy-looking brown goose with a long neck and a few grey feathers. Bold black outline.
enemies.aggressive: A swift, red fox with pointy ears and a bushy tail. Bold black outline.

powerups.health: A plump, red apple with a green stem. Bold black outline.
powerups.speed: A pair of bright blue running shoes with yellow laces. Bold black outline.

obstacles.wall: A simple brown wooden fence section. Bold black outline.
obstacles.rock: A grey, rounded boulder. Bold black outline.

assets.background: A cheerful, flat landscape with rolling green hills, a bright blue sky with fluffy white clouds, and a few simple green trees. A red barn in the distance.

ui_elements.score: Large, bold white numbers with a black outline, positioned in the top corner.
ui_elements.health_bar: A horizontal red bar that fills with green, enclosed in a grey rectangular outline. Starts full and depletes as damage is taken.

theme: create a game about a chicken crossing the road, keep it short and simple
